title: Cant launch League Of Legends
body: Every time I open the league of legends launcher it does the little loading circle on my cursor then the client just disappears.  Please help

replies.body:
Those little loading circles can really be a pain in the.....

It sounds like your OS might be blocking League from launching correctly. If you don't have the right permissions settings, sometimes an OS can think a program isn't trusted and can shut it down before it starts. Check out the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get League running again!
